name: Tethered (itch) (HavokRocket)
description:
Recommended Screen Resolution: 720p+

This is a game where you control an orange cube that is permanently attached to a yellow cube that can't do much. To add to this, the flimsy and unstable rope that connects the two, might not be very safe. Use your skills to complete the puzzle platforming levels. This was made as an entry to the "Diving Squid Community Jam."
